"First things first - If you’re reading this, it means you have come till here! I appreciate your time for exploring this app." "Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any suggestions or feedback to share, to recommend feature enhancements, to suggest new features to be added or just to connect to say hi." "I am currently looking for volunteers to help me make this app available for more languages. Thank again for your time."
"Application info:\n" "The Random app is about randomness theme, it is packed with numerous features that can be applied to day to day tasks. This app features are explained below:"

"Random Numbers
" "1. User can generate Random numbers which can be either Whole numbers or Decimal numbers.
" "2. For Decimal numbers generation, user can select precision up to 10 decimal points.
" "3. Generated results can be sorted in ascending order or descending order.
" "4. Up to 50000 Random numbers can be generated in one go.
" "5. User has option to generate repeatable numbers or unique numbers.
" "6. All the generated results can be copied, shared, formatted to be in linear comma separated format or in list format where every item is in new line."

"Random Passwords
" "1. User can generate Random passwords in which each password can have length up to 100 characters.
" "2. User can set minimum and maximum range for passwords length.
" "3. Passwords can contain any combinations of Capital letters, Small letters, Numbers and Special characters.
" "4. User can specify the Special characters set for passwords generation.
" "5. Up to 10000 unique random passwords can be generated in one go.
" "6. All the generated results can be copied, shared, formatted to be in linear comma separated format or in list format where every item is in new line."

"Dice Rolling
" "1. Dice rolling is always a fun. If you don’t find the Dice quickly, no worries, you can imitate traditional dice rolling on your mobile device using this app. Isn’t that cool!
" "2. Up to 9 dice can be rolled together.
" "3. User can see the individual dice results as well as total of all the dice roll."

"Random Dates and Times
" "1. User can generate Random dates and times within the selected range.
" "2. Up to 50000 unique Random dates and times can be generated in one go.
" "3. All the generated results can be copied, shared, formatted to be in linear comma separated format or in list format where every item is in new line."

"Random Colors
" "1. User can generate unique random colors on well displayed tiles.
" "2. Each color or all the generated colors can be copied using their hexadecimal color codes.
" "3. Up to 50 unique colors can be generated in one go.
"

"Card Picker
" "1. User can randomly pick a card from selected deck.
" "2. User can select a deck from 3 options(52 cards, 54 cards including 2 Jokers, 56 cards including 4 Jokers).
" "3. User can keep fetching a random card from whole deck repeatedly with all cards in it every time or user can keep fetching a random card from the remaining cards of the deck (Already picked cards will be removed for subsequent picks)."
"Flip coin\n" "1. User can imitate flipping the coin to get random results. It looks like the user is flipping the real coin.\n" "2. User has option to pick different country coin to flip."

"Unique Ids
" "1. User can generate Unique Ids, whenever user needs unique identifiers.
" "2. Up to 10000 unique Ids can be generated in one go.
" "3. All the generated results can be copied, shared, formatted to be in linear comma separated format or in list format where every item is in new line."

"Series Generator and Shuffler
" "1. Any selected list can be shuffled randomly.
" "2. Users can try to pick single item from the entire list randomly. (like lucky draw)
" "3. Multiple random series can be generated with selected list with flexible series size (Items per series).
" "4. User can exclude the series set which are having same items.
" "5. User can exclude the items which are already part of generated series for subsequent series (Unique series with unique items) generation.
" "6. User can see the selected input list details on the same screen for quick glance.
" "7. All the generated results can be copied and shared."

"Teams Formation
" "1. Users can generate teams out of the selected list.
" "2. User has option to provide the team size (members per team) or number of teams to be generated.
" "3. User can see the selected input list details on the same screen for quick glance.
" "4. All the generated results can be copied and shared."

"Yes-No or True-False\n" "1. Whenever you are confused and want your mobile device to try the luck of Yes-No/True-False for you then you can use Yes-No random results generation.\n" "2. You can select True-False or Yes-No option for random results generation."

"Rock-Paper-Scissors (R-P-S)\n" "1. Rock-Paper-scissors game is one of the classic games you can play with a friend. If you feel like to play, then you can play it through this app.\n" "2. User can also select Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock version for more fun with more random results."

"Saved lists
" "1. For series generations and for teams formation, user can provide input list to be used.
" "2. Each list can contain up to 1000 entries.
" "3. Saved lists can be viewed in a centralized place to manage your lists, where user can update the existing list, delete list, create new list and copy the list items."
"All the features are crafted to be smooth, robust and hassle free. Feel free to contact me if you come across any issues."

"Licensing informations:
" "Some of the Icons used in this app are from www.flaticon.com and designed by below mentioned designers.
" "Freepik - Home, Random numbers, Random Passwords, Random Colors, Unique Ids, Dice, Card Picker, Teams Formation, Yes-No 
" "mynamepong - Flip Coin 
" "Darius Dan - Series Generator, R-P-S 
" "Smashicons - Random Dates & Times, Saved Lists
" "Please visit www.flaticon.com for more licencing information.
"

"Data privacy:
" "This application does not store any of your information anywhere outside than your device. Everything you use, and you generate out of this app stays in your device locally.
" "The application usage details might be collected for improvisation of the app. Anytime if you feel or find any insecurities about your privacy on this app, feel free to notify us immediately so that we can try to address the same at earliest. At any point of time if you find any safety concerns, please stop using this app. Your support is always appreciated.
" "With the use of this app no harm or hazardous actions are intended, otherwise please stop using this application immediately."
